title: How To Make a Perfect Patty Melt with Chris Kronner
description:
We're making the ultimate patty melt with Chris Kronner of KronnerBurger and author of the cookbook A Burger to Believe In. 

Chris shows us two techniques to prep the beef, first by using a grinder and then chopping by hand. This sandwich gets topped with caramelized onions, creamy b√©chamel, hot mustard, and, of course, cheese. It's a patty melt to believe in.

Check out the recipe here: https://vice.video/munchies-recipe-patty-melt

WATCH NEXT: How to Make a Perfect Cheeseburger with Matty Matheson - https://youtu.be/gZuDMKXWU_E
